summary: A simple mod that enhances Skyhaven Temple.
descriptionHtml:
[color=white][size=12][b]SkyHaven Temple Glory:[/b][/size][/color]
[img=400x200]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/32921-4-1362654778.jpg[/img]

[color=red][size=3][u][b]Important:[/b][/u][/size][/color]
[color=Red]As most of you know, I have a few mods out on nexus. As others may know I have remade my Castle Volkihar mod into an Immersive and customizable mod. My plan is to remake all my mods in that line of thought. This is just to let all of you know that I will start remaking this mod soon and it will be customizable and more importantly immersive.[/color]

This mod enhances SkyHaven Temple by adding new stuff, cleaning it up.
If you like it please comment on ideas and constructive critism. I'm always open for suggestions so fell free to give your views. Please also tell me of any bugs you may encounter.

This mod takes effect after you talk to Paarthurnax after the quest "Alduins Wall", so go ahead and install it even if you haven't done that quest, it won't ruin your first trip to the temple!!

[color=white][size=2][b]Next Update:[/b][/size][/color]

It will include even more lights, a prison for dear old thalmor, more stuff in the temple. 
I will make a version where you have to build the new things in the temple so it feels even more realistic!

V 1.3: Fixed the lighting in the Karthspire. Added a lot of lights. Made it a bit more tidy.



[b]Chancelog:[/b]
V 1.3: Fixed the lighting in the Karthspire. Added a lot of lights. Made it a bit more tidy.
V 1.2: Added a few extra things like a throne as requested and a new little alchemy garden and a skyrim map. The beds have been changed also.
V.1: Completely remade the lights, added a shrine to Akatosh and more!!
[b]Compatibility:[/b]
All mods should work with mine but mods that modify SkyHaven Temple will clash... 
Enjoy!!!!

Check my other mods at: 

College Of Winterhold Glory days 
[img=400x200]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/thumbnails/32917-1-1362650606.jpg[/img]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32917]College Of Winterhold Glory days [/url]
author: devil0929
